fullText: Ricky Martin brings his considerable charisma to the role of Che, the narrator who serves as both conscience and Greek chorus, while Elena Roger reprises her Olivier Award-winning performance as Eva Perón with fiery intensity.
dtliExcerpt: Ricky Martin brings his considerable charisma to the role of Che, the narrator who serves as both conscience and Greek chorus, while Elena Roger reprises her Olivier Award-winning performance as Eva Perón with fiery intensity.
